sn7.21:1.2: Tena kho pana samayena sangaravo nama brahmano savatthiyam pativasati udakasuddhiko, udakena parisuddhim pacceti, sayam patam udakorohananuyogamanuyutto viharati.
sn7.21:1.3: Atha kho ayasma anando pubbanhasamayam nivasetva pattacivaramadaya savatthim pindaya pavisi.
sn7.21:1.4: Savatthiyam pindaya caritva pacchabhattam pindapatapatikkanto yena bhagava tenupasankami; upasankamitva bhagavantam abhivadetva ekamantam nisidi. Ekamantam nisinno kho ayasma anando bhagavantam etadavoca:
sn7.21:1.5: “idha, bhante, sangaravo nama brahmano savatthiyam pativasati udakasuddhiko, udakena suddhim pacceti, sayam patam udakorohananuyogamanuyutto viharati.
sn7.21:1.6: Sadhu, bhante, bhagava yena sangaravassa brahmanassa nivesanam tenupasankamatu anukampam upadaya”ti.
sn7.21:2.1: Atha kho bhagava pubbanhasamayam nivasetva pattacivaramadaya yena sangaravassa brahmanassa nivesanam tenupasankami; upasankamitva pannatte asane nisidi.
sn7.21:2.2: Atha kho sangaravo brahmano yena bhagava tenupasankami; upasankamitva bhagavata saddhim sammodi.
sn7.21:2.3: Sammodaniyam katham saraniyam vitisaretva ekamantam nisidi. Ekamantam nisinnam kho sangaravam brahmanam bhagava etadavoca:
sn7.21:2.4: “saccam kira tvam, brahmana, udakasuddhiko, udakena suddhim paccesi, sayam patam udakorohananuyogamanuyutto viharasi”ti?
sn7.21:2.6: “Kim pana tvam, brahmana, atthavasam sampassamano udakasuddhiko, udakasuddhim paccesi, sayam patam udakorohananuyogamanuyutto viharasi”ti?
sn7.21:2.7: “Idha me, bho gotama, yam diva papakammam katam hoti, tam sayam nhanena pavahemi, yam rattim papakammam katam hoti tam patam nhanena pavahemi.
sn7.21:2.8: Imam khvaham, bho gotama, atthavasam sampassamano udakasuddhiko, udakena suddhim paccemi, sayam patam udakorohananuyogamanuyutto viharami”ti.
sn7.21:4.1: Evam vutte, sangaravo brahmano bhagavantam etadavoca:
sn7.21:4.3: upasakam mam bhavam gotamo dharetu ajjatagge panupetam saranam gatan”ti.
